name: poolexplorer
description: example https://poolexplorer.xyz/draw140 ```     n: network (eth=1 poly=3 avax=4)     a: user address     c: array of prizes claimable     u: array of prizes unclaimable     b: normalized balance     w: sum of prizes claimable     d: sum of prizes dropped     g: users average balance ```           example https://poolexplorer.xyz/player?address=0xc8f7c0dc39c8f736e8d9ffd85c4adcb3c7a4bf37 ```     query: select network,address,draw_id,claimable_prizes from prizes where address = <address>
